Package org.cesecore.keys.validation

Interface CertificateValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CertificateProfileAwareValidator, Cloneable, DynamicUiModelAware, PhasedValidator, Profile, Serializable, Validator, ValidityAwareValidator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificateValidatorBase, ExternalCommandCertificateValidator
    public interface CertificateValidator
extends Validator, ValidityAwareValidator, DynamicUiModelAware
    Base interface for certificate validators. All certificate validators must implement this interface.
    Version:
    $Id: CertificateValidator.java 28140 2018-01-30 12:40:30Z andresjakobs $

    • Field Detail

      • DATE_FORMAT

        static final String[] DATE_FORMAT

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        List<String> validate​(CA ca,
                      Certificate certificate,
                      ExternalScriptsWhitelist whitelist)
               throws ValidatorNotApplicableException,
                      ValidationException,
                      CertificateException
        Method that validates the public key.
        Parameters:
        ca - the issuing CA.
        certificate - the certificate to validate.
        whitelist - a whitelist containing all scripts permitted to be executed
        Returns:
        the error messages or an empty list if the certificate was validated successfully.
        Throws:
        ValidatorNotApplicableException - when this validator is not applicable for the input, for example CVC certificate instead of X.509 or other type
        ValidationException - if the certificate could not be validated by the external command (exit code > 0).
        CertificateException - if one of the certificates could not be parsed.
